column4: ok cool, how do i run though :/
what roms should I get though?
i have about 12GB of xmame roms. :P
when you run xmame the first time it should make a .xmame dir. thats where the user can keep their own personal settings. and roms
you need to download the roms and put them in the right place.
do they have to be for xmame then? As google isn't helpful :(
theres DOZENS of sites out with mame info. google for 'mame' not xmame :P
xmame is the "X" version of mame.
the xmame confg file in /etc/ says to put them in  /usr/share/games/xmame/roms
OF ya can set that configl to put them whever.. OR you can use the command line optuons
leave them in zip folders or unzip?
I am still getting that error, when I have just put a rom in it ???
i got all my roms in that dir. and 'chmod 644' them all.
it seems its trying to load pacman before it does anything?
its defaults to the pacman rom by default
did you Download a packman.zip rom ?
